# Choice 2

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
homicides <- read_csv("../data/homicide-data.csv") %>% 
  filter(city == "Baltimore") %>% 
  mutate(reported_date = ymd(reported_date)) %>% 
  separate(col = reported_date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") %>% 
  select(-day) %>%
  unite(col = date, year, month, sep = "-")

```
